channel.title: Megan Fox will not be in Transformers 3
channel.description: ...and Alan Tudyk will. There is a glimmer of hope for the series yet. But WHY is she missing? I subscribe to this guy's theory from the imdb boards: [QUOTE=shotokanchickens] I think we can all agree the romantic sub plot was all for naught from the very beggining. But still i agree with u she needs to die, maybe she has an affair with a Decepticon and gets blown up by his robo-cock cannon? [/QUOTE] Thoughts?

item.title: Megan Fox will not be in Transformers 3

item.description:
I saw neither the first nor the second therefore I give not a donkey testicle about the third.

item.title: Megan Fox will not be in Transformers 3
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
SoaringScout:

Transformers movies = Screaming, running, explosions, attractive women, end.

It’s Michael Bay. It’s exactly what I expect from his movies and exactly what I want. However, there’s still a right and a wrong way to do it. Transformers 1, The Island - done right. Transformers 2 - a huge, resounding no. I’m hoping Transformers 3 will get it right again.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
I enjoy the Transformer movies for what they are. Big giant stompy robots kicking the shit out of each other fun.

And this isn’t news. She was ousted over half a year ago.

And John Malkovich is in it, which is cool.

And Patrick Dempsey is in it which is bad.
